summary: Changes Pelt -> Leather item weight to a more reasonable value
descriptionHtml:
This little mod will just fix Leather weight from 2 to 1 [B]fixing some inconsistencies[/B] in the original game.

Why this? Because vanilla game uses unreasonable weights for crafted Pelts, e.g.:

Wolf Pelt w:[U]1[/U] -> Leather w:2, new total inventory w:[U]2[/U] (!?)
Sabre Cat Pelt w:[U]2[/U] -> x4 Leather w:2, new total inventory w:[U]8[/U] (!?) 
Bear Pelt w:[U]3[/U] -> x4 Leather w:2, new total inventory w:[U]8[/U] (!?)
...

this means that from a Bear pelt weighting 3 you can craft 4 raw leather patches with a total weight  much bigger than the source Bear pelt (3->8??)!
To me this is wrong and nonsense even if you consider it can be chemically treated is still against all physics laws ;) and that\'s why I\'ve made this mod.

I\'ve noticed this issue in the vanilla game when I was close to my max carry weight, then I crafted some Pelts and found out I was instantly carrying too much slowing down my movements!

Supported languages: Ita, Eng, Ger, Fr

NEW!
 Added Dawnguard version.
 Leather weight is now 1.
author: Hexaae
